title: Summitt Sessions: Poetry In Motion
description: In honor of breast cancer awareness month, Cari Champion hears the incredible story of Paulette Leaphart, who walked topless across the country, as recalled by Leaphart and translated through poetry by Nikky Finney.
itunes:title: Summitt Sessions: Poetry In Motion
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
